org.cpsolver.coursett.criteria

Class TimetablingCriterion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.criteria.AbstractCriterion<Lecture,Placement>
      • org.cpsolver.coursett.criteria.TimetablingCriterion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, HasAssignmentContext<Lecture,Placement,AbstractCriterion.ValueContext>, Criterion<Lecture,Placement>, ExtendedInfoProvider<Lecture,Placement>, InfoProvider<Lecture,Placement>, ModelListener<Lecture,Placement>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackToBackInstructorPreferences, BrokenTimePatterns, DistributionPreferences, FlexibleConstraintCriterion, InstructorConflict, InstructorFairness, InstructorLunchBreak, Perturbations, PlacementSelectionCriterion, RoomPreferences, RoomSizePenalty, RoomViolations, SameSubpartBalancingPenalty, StudentConflict, TimePreferences, TooBigRooms

    public abstract class TimetablingCriterion
extends AbstractCriterion<Lecture,Placement>
    Abstract class for all timetabling criteria. On top of the AbstractCriterion, it provides weights for the PlacementSelection heuristics.
    Version:
    CourseTT 1.3 (University Course Timetabling)
